text: If statement for strings in python?
I am a total beginner and have been looking at http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Python_Programming/Conditional_Statements but I can not understand the problem here.
It is pretty simple, if the user enters y it should print this will do the calculation although I get a syntax error on IF answer=="y"

code:
answer = str(input("Is the information correct? Enter Y for yes or N for no"))
proceed="y" or "Y" 
If answer==proceed:
print("this will do the calculation"):
else:
exit()
